short_summary: Maintenance Support for SAP for the Central Agency Cluster, Shared Systems (CAC-SS)
description: The Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat (TBS) requires an ERP Functional Analyst Level 3 professional resource to provide maintenance support for SAP for the Central Agency Cluster–Shared Systems (CAC-SS) this SAP Cluster currently manages the ERPs for twenty-four (24) departments and agencies with twenty-six (26) legal entities and an expansive footprint. Similar services are currently being or have been performed by (Cache Computer Consulting Corp.) under contract number 24062-22-086 for a contract value estimated at $3,390,000.00 for the period from January 28, 2022 to March 31, 2025.

full_summary:
# Enterprise Resource Planning Functional Analyst Level 3

| **Tender Information**         | **Details**                                |
| --------------------------- | ------------------------------------------ |
| **Reference Number**         | `cb-4-80597055`                           |
| **Solicitation Number**      | `24062-25-156`                            |
| **Publication Date**          | `2024-11-18`                               |
| **Tender Closing Date**       | `2024-12-10T14:00:00`                     |
| **Trade Agreements**          | WTO GPA, Canada-Honduras, Canada-Ukraine, ... |

### Summary

The Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat (TBS) issues a request for proposal (RFP) for the Services of an Enterprise Resource Planning Functional Analyst Level 3 to support the maintenance of the SAP system for the Central Agency Cluster – Shared Systems (CAC-SS).

### Description of Work

The selected service provider will provide maintenance support for SAP to manage the ERPs for twenty-four (24) departments and agencies with twenty-six (26) legal entities. The scope of work includes, but is not limited to:

* Maintenance of the SAP system
* Resolution of technical issues
* Support for system updates
* Support for user training

### Evaluation Criteria and Selection Methodology

Evaluations will be conducted with fairness in accordance with the evaluation criteria and selection methodology defined in the RFP.

### Important Dates

* **Publication Date**: `2024-11-18`
* **Tender Closing Date**: `2024-12-10T14:00:00`
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: `2025-04-01`
* **Expected Contract End Date**: `2028-03-31`

### Contact Information
For any questions or clarifications, please contact:
